Title: Flow WPF - Flow diagram framework for WPF
Description: This project aims to create a framework to create applications that draws diagrams with drag-n-drop functionality and smart routing using MVVM pattern.
HomeWiki:
FlowWPF - Demo


This project aims to create a framework to create applications that draws diagrams with drag-n-drop functionality and smart routing using MVVM pattern.

The FlowWPF project is not yet open to the public. This is just a demo to see it in action!

Nuget available at https://www.nuget.org/packages/FlowWPF

Enjoy.

 

22/8/2016:

Due to licensing issues and server costs, FlowWPF will be discontinued on September 1st. Thanks to all who used it and supported us with feedback.
